A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One of the best Star Wars movies. Kylo Ren is now one of the most dynamic villains with a compelling character arc. Luke returns and takes his place in my heart as one of the best Star Wars heroes. Luke has a great redemption arc and has a sad backstory that is shared with Kylo. This movie is shot beautifully and has one of my scenes in Star Wars. The movie also brings up a interesting way to use hyperspace.
